 96 | fn add_title_line(result: &mut Vec<String>, main_annotation: Option<&Annotation>) {
 97 |     if let Some(annotation) = main_annotation {
 98 |         result.push(format_title_line(
 99 |             &annotation.annotation_type,
100 |             None,
101 |             &annotation.label,
102 |         ));
103 |     }
104 | }
